structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 171, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 250, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 3. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 4.
